content.stimulus_en: (may) ________ I come in?
It (could) ________ rain later.
She (may) ________ be at home.
We (could) ________ go to the cinema.
(could) ________ you help me, please?
(may) ________ I borrow your pen?
It could be a very difficult exam.
We go may to Italy for our holidays this year.
May I use your telephone for a moment?
Could speak you more slowly, please?
He may not be able to come to the party.
Could tell you me the way to the station, please?
